scripts.ts-like:compile: npm run unmemoize && fast-arktsc --input-files ./arktsconfig-unmemoized.json --output-dir ./build --compiler ../../../incremental/tools/panda/arkts/arktsc --link-name stub && ninja ${NINJA_OPTIONS} -f build/build.ninja
scripts.run:unmemoized: npm run unmemoize && npm run ts-like:compile && ../../../incremental/tools/panda/arkts/ark ./build/demo.abc --ark-boot-files ../../../incremental/runtime/build/incremental.abc --ark-entry-point @koalaui.runtime.demo.ETSGLOBAL::main
